definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 He2 neng2 Zong3 gong1 si1

sentences.english: But nuclear energy is all around me, at least every day.
sentences.chinese: 但核能其实就在我周围，至少每天都这样呢。

sentences.english: Nuclear energy, that's what is crazier.
sentences.chinese: 当然是核能了，那还用说。

sentences.english: The article also said the DPRK is vowing to strengthen its nuclear deterrence for the future.
sentences.chinese: 文章同时指出朝鲜坚持未来会深化核能力。

sentences.english: Those resources can displace nuclear power.
Both North Korea and Iran have been working to develop nuclear capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 北韩与伊朗都一直在努力发展核能力。

sentences.english: What are nuclear energy's green credentials?
sentences.chinese: 核能源的“绿色资本”到底是什么？

sentences.english: When it comes to the use of nuclear power, people’s opinions diverse greatly.
sentences.chinese: 当谈到核能利用时，人们的看法有很大差别。

sentences.english: More clean energy, such as biomass and nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 更多的清洁能源，比如生物能和核能。

sentences.english: When such complaints arise in France's most sensitive industry -- nuclear power -- alarm bells start ringing.
sentences.chinese: 当法国最敏感的核能产业怨声四起时，警钟已经敲响。

sentences.english: To supporters of nuclear power, fast-breeding is alluring.
sentences.chinese: 对于核能支持者来说，快堆很有诱惑力。

sentences.english: Nothing would ever discourage the Islamic Republic of Iran to stop its nuclear-energy program.
sentences.chinese: 没什么可以阻止伊朗伊斯兰共和国继续核能源计划。

sentences.english: Public acceptance is becoming a key problem for nuclear power development.
sentences.chinese: 公众接受性倏关核能的生存与发展。

sentences.english: He is the leader of the pro-business Free Democratic Party, which strongly supports nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 他是商界自由民主党的领导人，强烈支持使用核能。

sentences.english: But when did this nuclear energy extraction thing has started?
sentences.chinese: 但是核能物质的提取是从何时开始的呢？

sentences.english: The industry will be held to a high standard and it should be.
sentences.chinese: 核能行业将需要达到高标准，这无可厚非。

sentences.english: After several nuclear disasters, a controversy has raged over the safety of nuclear energy.
sentences.chinese: 几场核灾难过后，一场核能安全的争论到达了白热化。
